name.ja: クラッキング・クロウ

requirement.en: Equip this card to 1 face-up Dragon Type monster on your field.

effect.en: The equipped monster gains ATK equal to [the number of face-up Dragon Type monsters on the field] x 200. When the equipped monster attacks a Level 7 or higher Defense Position monster, inflict piercing battle damage (if the ATK of the attacking monster exceeds the DEF of the attack target, inflict the difference).

ja.set_name: Deck Mod Pack: Double Star of the Assault!!
